EmailTemplate.description: Thank you email after technical/in-depth interview
EmailTemplate.name: Thank You After Technical Interview
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You - {!Opportunity.Name} Interview
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Contact.FirstName},
Thank you so much for the opportunity to interview for the {!Opportunity.Name} position at {!Opportunity.Account.Name}.
I thoroughly enjoyed our in-depth discussion about the role and the technical challenges your team is addressing. The conversation further strengthened my interest in joining your organization and contributing to your goals.
I'm particularly excited about [specific aspect discussed in interview], and I'm confident that my experience and skills would enable me to make meaningful contributions from day one.
Please let me know if there's any additional information I can provide as you move forward with your decision-making process.
I look forward to hearing about next steps.
Best regards, Abby Luggery {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
